summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6162 for the improvement of Alaska Street from Beacon Avenue to Snoqualmie Street; and certain other streets, avenues, alleys and easements; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 86179, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
